subject: Re: perl on strings
body:
Nishi wrote:
> Hi:
> 
> I have a strings such as
> Formatting_l_cs.cat
> Formatting_l_da.cat
> Formatting_l_de.cat
> Formatting_l_zh-tw.cat
> I need to extract the substring before the "." and after the last occurence
> of "_" ie in the above cases, it would return "cs" or zh-tw" etc.
> 
> How can I achieve this?

HTH,

Rob


use strict;
use warnings;

my @files = qw(
  Formatting_l_cs.cat
  Formatting_l_da.cat
  Formatting_l_de.cat
  Formatting_l_zh-tw.cat);

foreach (@files) {
  my ($country) = /([^_]+)\./i;
  print $country, "\n";
}

**OUTPUT**

cs
da
de
zh-tw
